introduction.p1: Hi, I'm Silviu, a 27-year-old Senior Software Engineer with over 3 years of experience in web development technologies such as React, Angular and NodeJS. Driven by curiosity, I'm constantly on the hunt for new projects that push my skill set further. Proactive and optimistic, I thrive when faced with challenges, always approaching them with a solution-oriented mindset.
introduction.p2: I'm continuously seeking to learn more and adapt to the constant evolution of technologies in the Software Engineering branch by building personal projects and apps.
introduction.p3: Apart from my professional career and strong passion about web development, I'm also very interested about other things such as: photography, videography, travelling, video games and sports.

technologies.p1: When it comes to web technologies, I'm very passionate about everything that's out there, and since they are always changing, I try to keep up with the latest and greatest. Here are a few that I've worked with:

tlou.title: The Last Of Us
tlou.alt: The last of us image logo

hobbies.p1: In this section I'll be showcasing some of my hobbies mentioned above.
hobbies.p2: Some amazing titles that I love:
hobbies.p3: Speed skating is one of the most loved sports activities that I've practiced throughout my youth. Speed skating, though not that mainstream, is a character-building, competitive, and fun all-season activity that involves races using skates in the winter and roller-skates during warmer seasons.
hobbies.p4: During my 7-year speed skating career, I've obtained several awards for my performance, I've built strong friendships and connections and I developed a certain discipline that can only be obtained when practicing sports.

about.title: About
about.content: Hello, I'm Silviu, a 27-year-old Senior Software Engineer with a robust experience in web development. I've spent over three years honing my skills in modern technologies like React, Angular, and NodeJS. Driven by a natural curiosity, I'm always on the lookout for challenging projects that push my limits. I thrive both in team environments and when working independently, bringing a dynamic and positive energy to each task. My goal is always to exceed my previous achievements. I approach every project with a deep passion, committing to best practices and continuously expanding my knowledge base.

responsibilities.item1: In my role as a Senior Full Stack Developer, I focus on developing cutting-edge software solutions that simplify financial operations and elevate the user experience. My contributions are central to equipping our users with dependable and effective financial tools
responsibilities.item2: Working with tools like: React, NodeJS

responsibilities.item1: As a Full Stack Developer in my current project, I not only engineer scalable and efficient software solutions, but also contribute strategic business ideas aimed at boosting customer revenue
responsibilities.item2: Working with tools like: React, NodeJS, MongoDB, AEM, Algolia

responsibilities.item1: Consistently delivering superior quality services to our valued clients
responsibilities.item2: Working with tools like: AngularJS, Angular, NodeJS, Ionic, Cordova, Typescript

responsibilities.item1: Proactively collaborating with clients to deliver premium services and consultancy, ensuring excellence in my contributions
responsibilities.item2: Working with tools like: AngularJS, Angular, React, SCSS, NodeJS, Jira

responsibilities.item1: Assisting clients in developing robust WordPress websites
responsibilities.item2: Solving/reporting bugs and debugging (PHP, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL)

resumeApp.title: Resume / presentation website
resumeApp.description: A presentation app built for myself containing information like: resume, who am I and what I do, hobbies and more.

project1.title: React Weather App
project1.description: A weather app built with React and Express which enables the user to search the weather in certain cities around the world. The app automatically detects your location and displays the weather information that is most relevant to you.

project2.title: Web Sockets Chat
project2.description: A web chat application built with React on the FE and socket.io running on the BE. Users can connect to the chat room and exchange messages with each other.

project3.title: Url Shortener
project3.description: A web app created with VueJS and Express that enables the users to create short URLs. (similar to bit.ly). The 'Copy to clipboard' feature might not work due to the fact that the SSL certificate expired (https -> http).

project4.title: Disease predictor
project4.description: I engineered, fine-tuned, and validated a Neural Network that takes medical symptoms as input and forecasts the most likely corresponding disease. This model serves as the central element of a Flask-based backend server, which I also developed. This server is part of a custom API designed to interact with a frontend, accepting symptom data and returning the predicted disease.

project5.title: Smoke detector
project5.description: A smoke-detection system built using Python. When a certain value of gas or smoke is detected, I'm getting notified via email with a warning containing the details.
